about_the_game:
Time jumps and avoid obstacle as you collect treasures and find secret passages in the search of the best score!

Dungeon Fletcher is an ode to old school computer platformers of the 90s/80s!

Game modes

Challenge yourself in 4 different difficult modes, explore the dungeon and try to find all secret areas!
detailed_description:
Time jumps and avoid obstacle as you collect treasures and find secret passages in the search of the best score!

Dungeon Fletcher is an ode to old school computer platformers of the 90s/80s!

Game modes

Challenge yourself in 4 different difficult modes, explore the dungeon and try to find all secret areas!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux + SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo 2.0+ GHz or an equivalent AMD CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux + SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo 2.0+ GHz or an equivalent AMD CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
